00032 typedef struct _dbviewer {
00033     t_jbox      d_box;
00034     t_object    *d_dataview;    ///< The dataview object
00035     t_hashtab   *d_columns;     ///< The dataview columns:  column name -> column index
00036     t_object    *d_view;        ///< The dbview object that we need to display in a dataview
00037     t_symbol    *d_query;       ///< Attribute
00038     t_symbol    *d_database;    ///< Attribute
00039     t_object    *d_db;          ///< the actual database object
00040 } t_dbviewer;
00041

00044 // general prototypes
00045 void*       dbviewer_new(t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv);
00046 void        dbviewer_initdataview(t_dbviewer *x);
00047 void        dbviewer_free(t_dbviewer* x);
00048 void        dbviewer_newpatcherview(t_dbviewer *x, t_object *patcherview);
00049 void        dbviewer_freepatcherview(t_dbviewer *x, t_object *patcherview);
00050 t_max_err   dbviewer_notify(t_dbviewer *x, t_symbol *s, t_symbol *msg, void *sender, void *data);
00051 void        dbviewer_assist(t_dbviewer *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00052 void        dbviewer_getcelltext(t_dbviewer *x, t_symbol *colname, long index, char *text, long maxlen);
00053 t_max_err   dbviewer_set_query(t_dbviewer *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00054 t_max_err   dbviewer_set_database(t_dbviewer *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00055 
00056 
00057 static t_class  *s_dbviewer_class = NULL;
00058 static t_symbol *ps_dbview_update = NULL;
00059 static t_symbol *ps_dbview_query_changed = NULL;
00060 
00061 /************************************************************************************/
00062 
00063 int main(void)
00064 {
00065     t_class *c;
00066     long    flags; 
00067     
00068     common_symbols_init();
00069     c = class_new("dbviewer", (method)dbviewer_new, (method)dbviewer_free, sizeof(t_dbviewer), (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00070     c->c_flags |= CLASS_FLAG_NEWDICTIONARY;
00071     flags = JBOX_COLOR;
00072     jbox_initclass(c, flags);
00073     
00074     class_addmethod(c, (method)dbviewer_getcelltext,        "getcelltext",      A_CANT, 0);
00075     class_addmethod(c, (method)dbviewer_newpatcherview,     "newpatcherview",   A_CANT, 0); 
00076     class_addmethod(c, (method)dbviewer_freepatcherview,    "freepatcherview",  A_CANT, 0);
00077     class_addmethod(c, (method)dbviewer_notify,             "notify",           A_CANT, 0);
00078     class_addmethod(c, (method)dbviewer_assist,             "assist",           A_CANT, 0);
00079     class_addmethod(c, (method)stdinletinfo,                "inletinfo",        A_CANT, 0);
00080     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,         "dumpout",          A_CANT, 0);
00081     
00082     CLASS_ATTR_SYM(c,           "query",            ATTR_SET_DEFER, t_dbviewer, d_query);
00083     CLASS_ATTR_ACCESSORS(c,     "query",            NULL, dbviewer_set_query);
00084     CLASS_ATTR_SAVE(c,          "query",            0);
00085     
00086     CLASS_ATTR_SYM(c,           "database",         ATTR_SET_DEFER, t_dbviewer, d_database);
00087     CLASS_ATTR_ACCESSORS(c,     "database",         NULL, dbviewer_set_database);
00088     CLASS_ATTR_SAVE(c,          "database",         0);
00089     
00090     class_register(_sym_box, c);
00091     s_dbviewer_class = c;
00092     
00093     ps_dbview_update = gensym("dbview_update");
00094     ps_dbview_query_changed = gensym("dbview_query_changed");
00095     return 0;
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 /************************************************************************************/
00100 // Object Creation Method
00101 
00102 void *dbviewer_new(t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv)
00103 {
00104     t_dbviewer      *x;
00105     long            flags;
00106     t_dictionary    *d = NULL;
00107 
00108     if (!(d=object_dictionaryarg(argc, argv)))
00109         return NULL;
00110 
00111     x = (t_dbviewer*)object_alloc(s_dbviewer_class);
00112     if(x){
00113         flags = 0 
00114         | JBOX_DRAWFIRSTIN      
00115         | JBOX_NODRAWBOX
00116         | JBOX_DRAWINLAST
00117         //      | JBOX_TRANSPARENT  
00118         //      | JBOX_NOGROW
00119         //      | JBOX_GROWY
00120         | JBOX_GROWBOTH
00121         //      | JBOX_IGNORELOCKCLICK
00122         | JBOX_HILITE               
00123         //      | JBOX_BACKGROUND
00124         //      | JBOX_NOFLOATINSPECTOR
00125         //      | JBOX_TEXTFIELD
00126         ;
00127         
00128         jbox_new(&x->d_box, flags, argc, argv);
00129         x->d_box.b_firstin = (t_object*)x;
00130         object_obex_store((void *)x, _sym_dumpout, (t_object*)outlet_new(x, NULL));
00131 
00132         x->d_columns = hashtab_new(13);
00133         hashtab_flags(x->d_columns, OBJ_FLAG_DATA);
00134         x->d_query = _sym_nothing;
00135 
00136         dbviewer_initdataview(x);
00137         attr_dictionary_process(x, d);
00138 
00139         jbox_ready(&x->d_box);
00140     }
00141     return(x);
00142 }
00143 
00144 
00145 void dbviewer_initdataview(t_dbviewer *x)
00146 {
00147     x->d_dataview = (t_object*)jdataview_new();
00148     jdataview_setclient(x->d_dataview, (t_object*)x);
00149     jdataview_setcolumnheaderheight(x->d_dataview, 40);
00150 }   
00151 
00152 
00153 // Memory Deallocation
00154 void dbviewer_free(t_dbviewer *x)
00155 {
00156     db_view_remove(x->d_db, &x->d_view);
00157     db_close(&x->d_db);
00158     jbox_free(&x->d_box);
00159 }
00160 
00161 
00162 void dbviewer_newpatcherview(t_dbviewer *x, t_object *patcherview)
00163 {
00164     jdataview_patchervis(x->d_dataview, patcherview);
00165 }
00166 
00167 void dbviewer_freepatcherview(t_dbviewer *x, t_object *patcherview)
00168 {
00169     jdataview_patcherinvis(x->d_dataview, patcherview);
00170 }
00171 
00172 
00173 t_max_err dbviewer_notify(t_dbviewer *x, t_symbol *s, t_symbol *msg, void *sender, void *data)
00174 {   
00175     if(sender == x->d_view){
00176         if(msg == ps_dbview_update){
00177             t_object    *result = (t_object*)data;
00178             long        numrecords = (long)object_method(result, _sym_numrecords);
00179             long        numfields;
00180             long        i;
00181             char        *fieldname = NULL;
00182             t_symbol    *sfieldname = NULL;
00183             t_object    *column;
00184             long        column_index;
00185             t_rowref    *rowrefs = NULL;
00186             t_max_err   err;
00187             
00188             jdataview_clear(x->d_dataview);
00189             
00190             if(numrecords){
00191                 numfields = (long)object_method(result, _sym_numfields);
00192                 for(i = 0; i < numfields; i++){
00193                     fieldname = (char*)object_method(result, _sym_fieldnamebyindex, i);
00194                     if(fieldname){
00195                         sfieldname = gensym(fieldname);
00196                         err = hashtab_lookup(x->d_columns, sfieldname, (t_object**)&column_index);
00197                         if(!err){
00198                             ; // column already exists, so we leave it alone
00199                         }
00200                         else{
00201                             column = jdataview_addcolumn(x->d_dataview, sfieldname, NULL, true);
00202                             jcolumn_setlabel(column, sfieldname);
00203                             hashtab_store(x->d_columns, sfieldname, (t_object*)i);
00204                         }
00205                     }
00206                 }
00207                 
00208                 rowrefs = (t_rowref*)malloc(sizeof(t_rowref) * numrecords);
00209                 for(i = 0; i < numrecords; i++)
00210                     rowrefs[i] = (t_rowref*)(i+1);
00211                 jdataview_addrows(x->d_dataview, numrecords, rowrefs);
00212                 free(rowrefs);
00213             }
00214         }
00215         else if(msg == ps_dbview_query_changed){    // dump all of the columns
00216             t_object    *column = NULL;
00217             t_symbol    **column_names = NULL;
00218             long        numcolumns = 0;
00219             long        i;
00220             
00221             hashtab_getkeys(x->d_columns, &numcolumns, &column_names);
00222             if(column_names){
00223                 for(i=0; i<numcolumns; i++){
00224                     column = jdataview_getnamedcolumn(x->d_dataview, column_names[i]);
00225                     if(column)
00226                         jdataview_deletecolumn(x->d_dataview, column);
00227                 }       
00228                 sysmem_freeptr(column_names);
00229             }
00230             hashtab_clear(x->d_columns);
00231         }
00232         else if(msg == _sym_free){
00233             object_detach_byptr((t_object *)x, x->d_view);
00234             x->d_view = NULL;       
00235         }
00236     }
00237     return jbox_notify((t_jbox*)x, s, msg, sender, data);
00238 }
00239

00241 /************************************************************************************/
00242 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00243 
00244 // Method for Assistance Messages
00245 void dbviewer_assist(t_dbviewer *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00246 {
00247     if(msg==1){     // Inlets
00248         switch(arg){
00249             case 0: strcpy(dst, "(signal, control) Audio Input and Control Messages"); break;
00250             default: strcpy(dst, "(signal) Audio Input"); break;
00251         }
00252     }   
00253     else if(msg==2){ // Outlets
00254         if(arg == 0)
00255             strcpy(dst, "(signal) Audio Output");
00256         else if(arg == 1)
00257             strcpy(dst, "(symbol) Parameter Name Dump");
00258         else
00259             strcpy(dst, "dumpout");
00260     }   
00261 }
00262 
00263 
00264 void dbviewer_getcelltext(t_dbviewer *x, t_symbol *colname, long index, char *text, long maxlen)
00265 {
00266     t_object    *result = (t_object*)object_method(x->d_view, gensym("getresult"));
00267     char        *itemtext;
00268     long        column_index;
00269     t_max_err   err;
00270     
00271     if(!result)
00272         return;
00273     
00274     err = hashtab_lookup(x->d_columns, colname, (t_object **)&column_index);
00275     if(!err){
00276         itemtext = (char*)object_method(result, _sym_valuebyindex, index-1, column_index);
00277         
00278         if (itemtext && itemtext[0]) {
00279             if (strstr(colname->s_name, "date")) {
00280                 t_datetime td;
00281                 sysdateformat_strftimetodatetime(itemtext, &td);
00282                 sysdateformat_formatdatetime(&td, SYSDATEFORMAT_RELATIVE, 0, text, maxlen-1);
00283             } 
00284             else
00285                 strncpy_zero(text, itemtext, maxlen-1);
00286         }
00287     }
00288 }
00289 
00290 
00291 t_max_err dbviewer_set_query(t_dbviewer *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00292 {
00293     if(argc && argv){
00294         x->d_query = atom_getsym(argv);
00295         object_attr_setsym(x->d_view, _sym_query, x->d_query);
00296     }
00297     return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00298 }
00299 
00300 
00301 t_max_err dbviewer_set_database(t_dbviewer *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00302 {
00303     if(argc && argv){
00304         db_view_remove(x->d_db, &x->d_view);
00305         db_close(&x->d_db);
00306         
00307         x->d_database = atom_getsym(argv);
00308         db_open(x->d_database, NULL, &x->d_db);
00309         db_view_create(x->d_db, x->d_query->s_name, &x->d_view);
00310         object_attach_byptr_register(x, x->d_view, _sym_nobox);
00311     }
00312     return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00313 }
